info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 26 at 5:08PM CDT until March 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Reeves County in southwestern Texas... West central Ward County in western Texas...
* Until 600 PM CDT.
* At 507 PM CDT, blowing dust associated with a strong thunderstorm was 9 miles east of Toyah, moving north at 25 mph.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Emergency Management.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 19 and 48.
Locations impacted include... Barstow, Pecos, Toyah, Pecos Municipal Airport, and Toyah Lake.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 6:00 PM CDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 6:00 PM CDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued March 26 at 5:08PM CDT until March 26 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Midland/Odessa TX

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM CDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 6:00 PM CDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
